articles.content: The assurances came after Polands President Andrzej Duda, from the opposition Law and Justice party, this week asked the government to allow Netanyahu to attend the event. Duda wrote to Tusk’sgovernm… [+1230 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk hosts leader of Germany’s far-right AfD on X ahead of election - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Billionaire’s interest in Europe divides opinion – while some leaders raise alarm, Italy’s Meloni insists ‘no danger’.
articles.content:
Elon Musk has urged German voters to get behind the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) in next months national election during a broadcast with the partys leader.
